GSD.description:
drm/amd/amdgpu/amdgpu_cs: fix refcount leak of a dma_fence obj

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit bc2d5c0775c839e2b072884f4ee6a93ba410f107. For more details please see the references link.
